Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Johannesburg (Sandton), Sandton Lodge Inanda Guest House is convenient to Sandton City and Nelson Mandela Square. This 4-star guesthouse is within close proximity of Wanderers Stadium and Sandton Convention Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden.

Dining
A complimentary English breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
